```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
library(readr)
```

```{r}
head(teams_data)
```

# Clean the data

```{r}
teams_data <- teams_data %>%
  rename(PP_percent = "PP%",
         GF_G = "GF/G",
         S_percent = "S%",
         PK_percent = "PK%",
         SO_percent = "SO%") %>%
  mutate(S = parse_number(S),
         PIM = parse_number(PIM))
```

PP percent vs PK percent

```{r}
plot(PP_percent~PK_percent, data = teams_data)
abline(lm(PP_percent~PK_percent, data = teams_data), col = "red")
```

PK percent vs PIM

```{r}
plot(PK_percent~PIM, data = teams_data)
abline(lm(PK_percent~PIM, data = teams_data), col = "red")
```
